text: A shrug is a gesture that indicates either indifference or lack of knowledge. "Shrug" can also refer to: * Shoulder shrug, a weight training exercise * Shrug (band), a band that later became Snow Patrol * Shrug (clothing), an article of clothing * "Shrug", a verb that means to cast off, as in the Ayn Rand novel Atlas Shrugged
title: Shrug (disambiguation)
